page.title: 12RECREATION IN STATHAM
page.content:
{ Lymm Golf Course }
There is an 18 hole golf course situated in the South Eastern corner of the block near to the Manchester Ship Canal.
{Angling Facilities
There are two fishing areas in our block. 'Grey Mist' is a small pond situated near to the abattoir off the main Manchester road (not reccomended during hot summer days when the smells can be rather strong!). Statham pool is not far from the Golf Course.
The former belongs to Warrington Angling Club, the latter to Lymm Angling Club. Both require permits.
